TopicTitle: Graphics glitches when hovering over staging icons [0.90]

Articles.Content:
I get severe graphics glitches when I hover over the stage sequencing icons in either VAB or in flight. I have two different Macs with two different graphics cards and it happens on both of them. Stock installs on both. This never happened on 0.25. There are no prerequisite steps to reproduce this although the specific graphics glitches evolve depending on what you've been doing recently in or out of the game.

Generally this does not result in a crash and it goes away when you stop hovering over the icons. But it is disruptive because it prevents you from seeing which staging icons correspond to which parts on your spacecraft.
